title: A plain discourse about rash and sinful anger as a help for such as are willing to be relieved against so sad and too generally prevailing a distemper even amongst professors of religion : being the substance of some sermons preached at Manchester in Lancashire / by Henry Newcome ...
author: Newcome, Henry, 1627-1695.
notes: "To the reader" signed: John Howe, John Starkey.
Reproduction of original in Dr. Williams' Library.
